description.name: Garden machete 60cm JG
description.long_desc:
A garden machete 60cm is an essential tool for every nature and survival lover. This solid and durable machete will help you overcome any obstacle on your way, whether it is dense bushes or thick branches. It is made of thick stainless hardened steel, which ensures its long-lasting sharpness and corrosion resistance. A comfortable wooden handle provides a secure and comfortable grip, as well as gives the machete an elegant look. The machete is factory sharpened, but depending on the work performed, it may require sharpening on your own. The total length of the machete is 60cm, the blade length is 45cm, and the handle length is 15cm.


Product characteristics:



  • made of thick stainless steel

  • comfortable wooden handle

  • the machete is factory sharpened, but depending on the work performed, it may require sharpening on your own


Technical specification:



  • Total length: 60cm

  • Blade length: 45 cm

  • Handle length: 15 cm

  • Material: hardened steel

  • Handle: wood

description.name: 320mm japanese style double-sided saw
description.long_desc:
Japanese Double-Sided Saw with a 320mm Blade


A 320mm blade Japanese saw that provides precise and efficient cutting for various applications. Its unique feature is the double-sided blade with 7 teeth per inch and 12 teeth per inch, allowing you to handle different types of cuts. The flexible metal and ergonomic rubber handle ensure comfort and control during work, and the replaceable blade makes the tool durable and easy to maintain.


Features and advantages of this Japanese double-sided saw include:



  • Double-sided cutting with multiple teeth per inch, allowing for versatile use.

  • Flexible metal that adapts to different materials and cutting positions.

  • Comfortable rubber handle that provides a secure grip and reduces vibrations.

  • Replaceable blade made of 65MN steel, extending the tool's lifespan.

  • Plastic blade covers.

  • Effortless cutting of materials.


Examples of using the Japanese double-sided saw include:



  • Cutting wood, both along and across the grain.

  • Carpentry and DIY projects.

  • Processing building materials during renovations and construction.


This versatile saw is an invaluable tool for professionals and hobbyists who expect high quality and precision when cutting various materials.


Technical specifications:



  • Tool Length: 660mm

  • Blade Length: 320mm

  • Material: Manganese Steel

  • 7TPI/12TPI (teeth per inch)

  • Ergonomic Rubber Handle

  • Replaceable Blade for extended tool life

  • Plastic Blade Covers

  • Color: Black-Blue

description.name: Portable electric single burner stove 1000W
description.long_desc:
The electric stove - a single-burner hot plate with a power of 1000W, is an excellent solution for those who value speed and efficiency in cooking. Thanks to its high power, it allows for rapid heating of dishes, reducing meal preparation time. Additionally, the portability of this stove enables easy moving from place to place, making it an ideal tool for cooking at work, while traveling, or outdoors in good weather.

Using this stove, you have access to 5 power levels for adjusting, giving you full control over the cooking process. Whether you need intense frying or gentle reheating, you can adjust the power according to your needs. The sturdy construction of the stove ensures not only durability but also safety during use.

The single-burner hot plate finds wide application in various situations. It can be used in small kitchens, studio apartments, vacation homes, or while camping. It also serves well as an additional heat source in case of main kitchen equipment failure. Its compact size and adjustable power capability make it a reliable tool for individuals seeking a flexible and efficient cooking method, regardless of location or circumstances.

Product Features:

Non-stick coating - easy to clean
Rubber feet
Spiral heating plate
Compatible with all types of pans and pots
Made from heat-resistant materials
Technical Specifications:

Cable Length: 75 cm
Heating Plate Diameter: 15.5 cm
Power: 1000W
Gradual power adjustment from 1 to 5
On/Off indicator light

description.name: Aerated Concrete Saber Saw Blade 305mm 20T
description.long_desc:
305mm 20-Tooth Carbide Tipped Cellular Concrete Blade

A 305mm blade with 20 teeth designed for swift and precise cutting in various materials. Its versatility makes it highly effective when working with ceramics, concrete blocks, cellular concrete, hollow bricks, and plasterboard. Equipped with hardened carbide teeth (HM), it ensures durability and performance.

Features and advantages of this saw blade include:

Swift cutting for increased work efficiency.
2 teeth per inch (2TPI) for stability and precision in cutting.
This saw blade can be used for:

Preparing openings for sockets, switches, or lighting.
Construction and renovation work, including cutting various building materials.
Technical specifications:

Type: HM (Hardened Carbide)
Length: 305mm
Height: 50mm
Working Length: 260mm
Thickness: 1.5mm
Tooth Pitch: 12.7mm

Its versatility makes it highly effective when working with ceramics, concrete blocks, cellular concrete, hollow bricks, and plasterboard. Equipped with hardened carbide teeth (HM), it ensures durability and performance.


Features and advantages of this saw blade include:



  • Swift cutting for increased work efficiency.

  • 2 teeth per inch (2TPI) for stability and precision in cutting.


This saw blade can be used for:



  • Preparing openings for sockets, switches, or lighting.

  • Construction and renovation work, including cutting various building materials.


Technical specifications:



  • Type: HM (Hardened Carbide)

  • Length: 455mm

  • Height: 50mm

  • Working Length: 360mm

  • Thickness: 1.5mm

  • Tooth Pitch: 12.7mm

description.name: Mini car charger 24W 4.8A (quick charge)
description.long_desc:
Fast Car Charger with 2xUSB 4.8A Compact Size



  • Manufacturer: Keltin

  • Model: CC316-2A

  • Power: 24W

  • Ports: USB1: 5V/2.4A; USB2: 5V/2.4A

  • Input Voltage: 12V - 24V

  • Single Current: 2.4A

  • Total Current (max): 4.8A

  • Compatibility: universal

  • Dimensions: 40x20mm

  • Sleek glossy black appearance

  • Charge two devices simultaneously

  • Safe equipment charging

  • Fits perfectly in the cigarette lighter socket


 


Compact Design


The aesthetic look of the charger and its small size make it an ideal solution for those who want the charger to take up as little space as possible.


The special finish of the charger makes it easy to remove it from the cigarette lighter socket.


 


Charge Two Devices Simultaneously


The charger is suitable for all types of vehicles: passenger cars as well as trucks. The charger operates in sockets with 12 - 24V voltage.


With its high output power and dual USB ports, it allows you to charge or power two devices simultaneously.


 


Key Features



  • Does not interfere while driving - the charger practically hides entirely in the cigarette lighter socket.

  • Equipment safety during charging - the charger's intelligent electronic system adjusts current parameters to the specific device.

  • Ridiculously simple installation

  • Works in passenger cars, delivery vans, and trucks.

description.name: Car charger 36W 7.2A (QC3.0)
description.long_desc:
This advanced car charger featuring quick charging functionality through USB QC3.0 ports with a total power of 36W and a maximum voltage of 7.2A is an excellent solution for modern drivers. Its dual USB port design enables simultaneous charging of two devices, which is particularly beneficial in situations where you need to charge or power two devices at once. This feature makes the charger an indispensable efficient and safe accessory during long journeys, allowing you to fully utilize driving time to charge multiple devices.


With QC3.0 technology and a maximum voltage of 7.2A, this charger supports quick charging, leading to a reduction in device charging time. The sleek black design adorned with a carbon element and the triangular shape of the charger not only adds a modern look but also facilitates device operation by conveniently inserting and removing the charger from the charging socket. High charging efficiency, the ability to charge two devices simultaneously, and its compact size make this charger an ideal companion for long trips, ensuring that your electronic devices are fully powered and ready to use.


Product Features:



  • Quick charging functionality

  • Two USB QC3.0 ports with a combined maximum voltage of 7.2A

  • Stylish design and compact size


Technical Specifications:



  • Manufacturer: Keltin

  • Model: CC50-2A

  • Ports: USB1: 3.6/6.5V/3.6A; USB2: 3.6/6.5/3.6A

  • Input voltage: 12V - 24V

  • Single current: 3.6A

  • Combined current (max): 7.2A

  • Compatibility: universal

  • Dimensions: 70 x 30 mm

description.name: 5pc wire brush drill attachments kit
description.long_desc:
Set of 5 Wire Brushes for excellent surface cleaning. Made from high-quality dense corrugated brass-plated wire, these brushes provide unparalleled effectiveness in various tasks.


Product Characteristics:


Our brushes have a 6 mm shank, which fits perfectly into any drill and screwdriver. This means that assembly and operation are extremely simple, and you can easily adapt the tool to your needs.


Before painting or applying putty, it is necessary to properly prepare the surface. Our wire brush will allow you to effectively remove old paints, rust, and any dirt, providing an ideal substrate for a new finish.



Set Elements:



  • disc brush 50 mm

  • disc brush 65 mm

  • end brush 50 mm

  • end brush 65 mm

  • brush 25 mm

description.name: Cotton Work Gloves s.8 with Nitrile Palm Coating, Knit Wrist (white-grey)
description.long_desc:
GEKO White and Grey Protective Gloves EN388 4121 are a reliable choice for those in need of robust protection in challenging work conditions. Here are some key features and benefits of this product:




  • EN388 Standard: Gloves that meet this standard are designed to provide effective protection against various mechanical hazards. The classification 4121 means that these gloves have high abrasion resistance (rating 4), making them durable and long-lasting, as well as good tear resistance (rating 2), which increases their lifespan.




  • Material: The gloves are made of cotton knit, ensuring comfort and a good fit for your hands. Additionally, they are coated with latex, which improves grip and provides extra protection.




Examples of using GEKO protective gloves:




  • Construction Work: These gloves are ideal for working on construction sites where various mechanical hazards such as abrasions or cuts may occur.




  • Gardening: During gardening tasks, these gloves protect your hands from thorns, sharp branches, and other potential hazards.




With GEKO protective gloves, you can work with confidence, knowing that your hands are adequately protected while maintaining full functionality and comfort.


Technical Specifications:



  • Size: 8

  • Material: Cotton knit coated with latex

  • Color: White and Grey

  • Safety Standard: EN 388 - 4121

  • Abrasion Resistance: 4

  • Cut Resistance: 1

  • Tear Resistance: 2

  • Puncture Resistance: 1

description.name: Cotton Work Gloves s.7 with Crinkled Latex Palm Coating, Knit Wrist (red)
description.long_desc:
GEKO Red and Black Protective Gloves EN388 2131 are a reliable choice for those who need not only protection but also comfort in challenging work conditions. Here are some key features and benefits of this product:




  • EN388 Standard: These gloves meet the EN388 standard, which means they are designed to provide protection against various mechanical hazards. In the classification 2131, this means that the gloves have good cut resistance (rating 2) and exceptionally good tear resistance (rating 3), making them durable and long-lasting.




  • Material: Made of cotton knit coated with latex, these gloves combine comfort and protection. Cotton knit provides comfort and a good fit for your hands, while the latex coating improves grip and provides additional protection.




Examples of using GEKO protective gloves:




  • Renovation Work: These gloves are excellent for renovation work, where handling various materials and tools may be necessary.




  • Gardening: In the garden, they can protect against minor cuts and damage to the skin of the hands when handling garden tools and coming into contact with plants.




GEKO protective gloves combine reliability and comfort, making them the ideal tool for those who value both safety and comfort at work.


Technical Specifications:



  • Size: 7

  • Material: Cotton knit coated with latex

  • Color: Red and Black

  • Safety Standard: EN 388 - 2131

  • Abrasion Resistance: 2

  • Cut Resistance: 1

  • Tear Resistance: 3

  • Puncture Resistance: 1

description.name: Thermal fluorescent work gloves size 8
description.long_desc:
Geko Insulated Fluorescent Winter Work Gloves


Made from latex-coated polyester with an interior of acrylic yarn, Geko protective gloves provide excellent insulation against the cold during fieldwork and construction.


The soft and insulating interior keeps hands warm during long hours of work. These gloves are fluorescent, which enhances safety on the construction site.


The gloves have high abrasion resistance, making them highly tear-resistant.


Technical Specifications:



  • Size: 8

  • Fluorescent: Yes

  • Insulated: Yes

  • Protection: EN 2122

Geko Insulated Fluorescent Winter Work Gloves


Made from latex-coated polyester with an interior of acrylic yarn, Geko protective gloves provide excellent insulation against the cold during fieldwork and construction.


The soft and insulating interior keeps hands warm during long hours of work. These gloves are fluorescent, which enhances safety on the construction site.


The gloves have high abrasion resistance, making them highly tear-resistant.

description.name: Women's Work Gloves with Nitrile Coating s.6
description.long_desc:
GEKO Women's Garden Protective Gloves EN388 4121 are a reliable choice for those who need solid protection in challenging work conditions. Here are some key features and benefits of this product:




  • EN388 Standard: Gloves meeting this standard are designed to provide effective protection against various mechanical hazards. The classification 4121 means that these gloves have high abrasion resistance (rating 4), making them durable and long-lasting, as well as good tear resistance (rating 2), which increases their lifespan.




  • Material: The gloves are made of cotton knit, ensuring comfort and a good fit for your hands. Additionally, they are coated with latex, which improves grip and provides extra protection.




Examples of using GEKO protective gloves:




  • Construction Work: These gloves are ideal for working on construction sites where various mechanical hazards such as abrasions or cuts may occur.




  • Gardening: During gardening tasks, these gloves protect your hands from thorns, sharp branches, and other potential hazards.




With GEKO protective gloves, you can work with confidence, knowing that your hands are adequately protected while maintaining full functionality and comfort.


Technical Specifications:



  • Size: 6

  • Material: Cotton knit coated with latex

  • Color: Blue with colorful flowers

  • Safety Standard: EN 388 - 4121

  • Abrasion Resistance: 4

  • Cut Resistance: 1

  • Tear Resistance: 2

  • Puncture Resistance: 1
